contents: The Wonderful Wizard of Oz is an American classic, and will probably astonish those who know only the movie, which took considerable liberties with the story in its adaptation.
Handmaid's Tale season one proved an unsettling watch thanks to its dark and dreary nature, but one that was incredibly enthralling and absolutely binge-worthy.
The suspense and story is just so brilliant and well thought out. But the best thing about this show are the characters
Awesome! Gripping! Visually Stunning! Wandavision is a smash-hit!
